pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power and Sample Size Calculation for Bulk Tissue and Single-Cell eQTL Analysis // Power and sample size calculation for bulk tissue and single-cell eQTL analysis based on ANOVA, simple linear regression, or linear mixed effects model. It can also calculate power/sample size for testing the association of a SNP to a continuous type phenotype. Please see the reference: Dong X, Li X, Chang T-W, Scherzer CR, Weiss ST, Qiu W. (2021) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btab385.
